text: <@UJJ239SC9> I have a client that needs some customizations to Deals. They really need a repeating field in the deal object that would be sort of like ‘line items’, but a bit different. The functionality of the Product Library, but at the deal object level if that makes sense
Assuming you need some unknown number of fields, than the best option is likely to use a CRM Card or a Custom Object (or a combination of both)

a bit late to the party but this one has a 60/mins a month free, which is usually enough for the odd bug’s clients send me, (I’m a bit lazy and moslty assume my coding is perfect :P)
<https://www.lambdatest.com/>
